item.title: 2011 hybridding
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

ytuio9`:

Hey dude you’re so shit with your switching 'ting I’d destroy you if I went 'gainst ya in PvP in game FUCKING DESTROY YA YO YOU HEAR ME I’d fuck you up in PvP mate my hybrid skills are fucking superior to you, never forget that

His switching isn’t that bad(pretty bad but still could’ve won if he did other things differently)… What generally makes him lose is the fact he’s fighting with people with large gear bonus differences then makes silly decisions like when he keeps barraging when the person in vesta whip is attacking. although he may hit a lot(which he doesnt lmao) as he has incredibly low defence in ahrims which leaves him getting raped by the whip:L. So he should have switched to melee to tank a few hits until he could moved then barraged moved back and so forth.

Also, tribrids rip hybrids to pieces and its not wise to fight a tribrid unless your going to make a quick k0.

Read full topic

item.title: 2011 hybridding
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:27, topic:423418”][quote author=Hash1 Single link=topic=526055.msg3834054#msg3834054 date=1322775376]

U just can’t pk…You kept switching after hitting ONCE. do you really think you are gonna win like that? ROFL

Are you dumb? This is hybridding, not edge pking retard

ps: thanks for the laugh

If you call that hybriding, you’re a total douche…Hybriding is tactical and in that video, there was no tactic at all. Kept switching items every time he hit…Though, the opponent did know what’s hybriding.

Hybridding is bringing two combat styles. I displayed this correctly in every clip of the video. I have a different STYLE of hybridding than you watch. PS, I don’t switch every hit. You’re either blind or ignorant if you think that

I know what hybridding is, and I can tell, you’re doing it wrong. And yes you do switch after each hit(rofl).
The hybridding I’ve seen is tactical PKing with 2(or 3) combat styles which are tactically used…which isn’t what you did.

3 switches is called TRIBRIDDING and HYBRIDDING is 2. Listen, I’m far from doing it wrong and if you’d really want to vs me[size=18pt] we can go ahead and 1v1 and I will GUARANTEE you will get smashed.[/size]
[/quote]

This is why no one likes purely pkers. You’re all stuck up assholes who get super cocky when you win, and say that, when you lose, either you “lagged” or the other person cheated.[/quote]
I THOUGHT I WAS THE ONLYO NE WHO THOUGH THIS
THANK YOU REY!!!

[quote=“rip4d, post:28, topic:423418”]Pker: fight me u skull
Me: no
Pker: pussy
Me: k
leaves wilderness

Thats basically how they come…[/quote]
AND RIPD

[quote=“JavaTC, post:30, topic:423418”]I loved pking, but the pure community was shit, if I loose they flame me endlessly, if I win they say “wow rm me you peice of shit ill wreck you you fat fuck” Just because you are a pure in this train-wreck of a game doesn’t mean your so fucking cool.

3 switches is called TRIBRIDDING and HYBRIDDING is 2. Listen, I’m far from doing it wrong and if you’d really want to vs me we can go ahead and 1v1 and I will GUARANTEE you will get smashed.

You just proved it with that.[/quote]
AND THIS

AND MOSTLY, THIS:

[quote=“t4, post:29, topic:423418”][quote author=Hash1 Single link=topic=526055.msg3834054#msg3834054 date=1322775376]

U just can’t pk…You kept switching after hitting ONCE. do you really think you are gonna win like that? ROFL

Are you dumb? This is hybridding, not edge pking retard

ps: thanks for the laugh

If you call that hybriding, you’re a total douche…Hybriding is tactical and in that video, there was no tactic at all. Kept switching items every time he hit…Though, the opponent did know what’s hybriding.

Hybridding is bringing two combat styles. I displayed this correctly in every clip of the video. I have a different STYLE of hybridding than you watch. PS, I don’t switch every hit. You’re either blind or ignorant if you think that

I know what hybridding is, and I can tell, you’re doing it wrong. And yes you do switch after each hit(rofl).
The hybridding I’ve seen is tactical PKing with 2(or 3) combat styles which are tactically used…which isn’t what you did.

3 switches is called TRIBRIDDING and HYBRIDDING is 2. Listen, I’m far from doing it wrong and if you’d really want to vs me[size=18pt] we can go ahead and 1v1 and I will GUARANTEE you will get smashed.[/size]
[/quote]
What are you, 12?[/quote]

They are all stuck up 9 year olds who used bots and got their way to the top so they can just piss people off with their egos that are probably a million times that of _supers, and they cried when the bots were gone, etc.

Those kids, are what kill rs, they can all get fucked by a mutated nigger cow. ./rant

tl;dr: They are annoying, stuck up, qqing, botting, game killing fags.
